markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nestling Fall](/Feats.aspx?ID=2644) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Strix" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=342" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 136 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You trust the strength of your wings and can spread them to glide safely to the ground. As long as you can act, you take no damage from falling, no matter what distance you fall.
name: Nestling Fall
